Renee and I continue to mourn the passing of President George H.W. Bush and pray for the Bush family.

Watch the State Funeral for President George H.W. Bush live here:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?455342-1/president-george-hw-bush-state-funeral-service&live … #Remembering41
TUNE IN: I’m joining @wbtradio at 7:50 this morning. 📻 https://wbt.radio.com

#Bush41 always answered the call to serve, & he did so with the utmost decency, integrity & patriotism. Just as important, he devoted his life to his family & his beloved wife, Barbara. He lived a full and meaningful life – one dedicated to his family, our country & God.

Renee and I continue to mourn the passing of President George H.W. Bush and pray for the Bush family. I was honored to pay my respects this evening as the president lies in state at the U.S. Capitol. #Bush41 #Remembering41 pic.twitter.com/9qzFcu18E2
Awaiting the arrival of #Bush41 #Remembering41 pic.twitter.com/M5cBFSnWBB

On my way to the Capitol. Here’s the view from Cannon House Office Building of lights preparing for President George H. W. Bush’s arrival. The president will lie in state at the @UScapitol as we all pay our respects and honor the life and legacy of 41. #Remembering41 pic.twitter.com/JYH02CArxH

Today at 5:00 p.m., the Bush family and friends, the vice president, members of Congress, and members of the administration will gather for a service honoring President Bush.

You can watch live on CSPAN:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?455338-1/president-george-hw-bushs-casket-arrives-joint-base-andrews …

Former President George H.W. Bush will lie in state in the U.S. Capitol Rotunda starting this evening and members of the public are invited to pay their respects between 7:30 p.m. tonight and 7:00 a.m. on Wednesday.

Renee and I are saddened to learn of the passing of President George H. W. Bush. We extend our deepest sympathy and condolences to the Bush family. President Bush lived a full life - one dedicated to his family, our country and God. May he rest in peace.
